features: ALL-IN-ONE SAND TOY SET: Get everything you need for a fun day at the beach with this sand toy set that includes a waterproof carrying bag, sand truck, sand castle bucket, beach shovel, rake, and 6 sand castle molds. Your kids will have a blast building sandcastles and playing in the sand with these toys.

CONVENIENT AND PORTABLE: The durable and waterproof mesh bag makes it easy to store and carry all the pieces of this sand toy set. Take it with you to the beach, park, or backyard for hours of outdoor fun.

SAFE AND NON-TOXIC: You can trust that this sand toy set is made with safe and non-toxic materials that have been rigorously tested and certified to meet all safety standards. We've also made sure that there are no exposed parts or pieces that could pose a safety hazard to children.

VERSATILE AND FUN: This sand toy set is perfect for a variety of outdoor activities, including beach play, sandbox play, and water table play. It's great for kids of all ages and can provide hours of entertainment and imaginative play.

SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: We stand behind the quality of our products and offer a 12-month guarantee. If anything happens to your Beach Sand Toys Set within the first 12 months of owning them, we will replace it at no charge to you. Customer satisfaction is our top priority.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: MORE FUN IN TOY LIFE Let‘s celebrate the summer time! TOY Life strives to discover an ideal path that helps to foster children's early comprehensive development. When kids build the different shapes of creatures with beach toys for kids 3-10, It's also a process to foster their sensory experience, the potential ability for creativity and imagination. Kids, playing gross attention on kids sand toys to enjoy the explorative and imaginative nature instead of endless screentime.

INTERACT, PLAY, LEARN TOY LIFE is a US based company creating infant and children’s toys. We understand the importance of early childhood education, including developing hand-eye coordination, creativity, boosting self-confidence, patience and most importantly igniting a child’s interest in learning. As a family-owned and operated children’s toy company, we take great pride in providing kids toys that are safe, educational, interactive, and most importantly fun! DESIGN HIGHLIGHTS SAFE FOR KIDS ASSURE FOR PARENTS Made of non-toxic and high-quality BPA-free material, the ASTM & CPC certified sand castle kit is built to last, double thickness, and more durable compared with other sand box toys. The bucket comes with an easy carry handle, and the whole set is made of lightweight but firm and durable material, with a large beach bag for storage. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Toys are ok, bag is cheap
reviews.reviewText: The toys are made of very lightweight plastic, kind of cheap but does the job well.The bag does not close, and is made of VERY cheap materials.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great set - 3 buckets
reviews.reviewText: This is great set. I was looking for something with more than one bucket since they take the most beating. This has 3 which is great. The material is softer and way better than the cheapest plastic out there. Buckets aren’t huge but work well for my kids.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great sand toy
reviews.reviewText: My kids loved these! We used them on the beach and the bags it came with were great for dunking in the ocean to clean out the sand!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality made product
reviews.reviewText: Grandson loved it. Fits his small hands really well. He is still playing with it. The bag is nice for carrying the pieces and he feels like a big boy carrying his own things around in his bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Durable and kid friendly
reviews.reviewText: So far the buckets etc have been durable and our kiddo likes them. The sieve doesn’t really sieve the play sand from Home Depot. Maybe it’s thick? Pleased overall but wish the bag to hold it all had a zipper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Look nice but not sturdy
reviews.reviewText: These LOOK like they'd be much higher quality than they actually are. I expected them to be similar to Green Toys USA due to their colors etc, but they are pretty poor quality. My 2 year old can easily squish the small turquoise castle tops, and the shovels are barely strong enough to dig through sand without bending (the shovel and rake are basically useless). The dump trucks wheels don't turn at all. The light green bucket is much smaller than I expected (pictured next to a "normal sized" yellow bucket I got from a grocery store which doesn't look as nice but feels much stronger!). My daughter still likes to play with all of it, and despite the flimsiness the castle tops are a nice touch for building sand castles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This was the perfect set for my toddler. The size is perfect for little hands, and we had a blast using these at the beach.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It does the job
reviews.reviewText: Easy to travel with, my one year son had a lot of fun in the sand with it. It’s also easy to clean.
